程序包 org.texttechnology.parliament_browser_6_4.helper

类 FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.texttechnology.parliament_browser_6_4.helper.FileUtils
  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility methods for handling files, including zipping and unzipping files, deleting directories, and managing properties files.
    作者:
    Yingzhu Chen, He Liu

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      FileUtils()

      static java.lang.Integer countFilesInZip​(java.lang.String zipFilePath)
      Counts the number of files within a zip archive.
      static void deleteDirectory​(java.io.File directory)
      Recursively deletes a directory and all of its contents.
      static boolean fileExists​(java.lang.String filePath)
      Checks if a file exists at the specified path.
      static java.util.Properties getProperties​(java.lang.String filePath)
      Loads properties from the specified properties file.
      static void storeProperty​(java.lang.String filePath, java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value, java.lang.String comments)
      Stores a property in the specified properties file.
      static void unzip​(java.lang.String zipFilePath, java.lang.String destDirectory)
      Unzips the specified zip file to a destination directory.
      static void zipFiles​(java.lang.String sourceDir, java.lang.String zipFilePath)
      Compresses files in the specified directory into a zip file.

    • 构造器详细资料

    • 方法详细资料

      • zipFiles

        public static void zipFiles​(java.lang.String sourceDir,
                            java.lang.String zipFilePath)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Compresses files in the specified directory into a zip file.
        参数:
        sourceDir - Path to the directory containing files to be zipped.
        zipFilePath - Path where the zip file will be created.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs during file processing.

      • deleteDirectory

        public static void deleteDirectory​(java.io.File directory)
        Recursively deletes a directory and all of its contents.
        参数:
        directory - The directory to be deleted.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - If a security manager exists and denies the delete operation.

      • fileExists

        public static boolean fileExists​(java.lang.String filePath)
        Checks if a file exists at the specified path.
        参数:
        filePath - The path to the file.
        返回:
        True if the file exists, false otherwise.

      • countFilesInZip

        public static java.lang.Integer countFilesInZip​(java.lang.String zipFilePath)
        Counts the number of files within a zip archive.
        参数:
        zipFilePath - Path to the zip file.
        返回:
        The number of files in the zip archive, or null if the file doesn't exist.

      • storeProperty

        public static void storeProperty​(java.lang.String filePath,
                                 java.lang.String key,
                                 java.lang.String value,
                                 java.lang.String comments)
        Stores a property in the specified properties file.
        参数:
        filePath - The path to the properties file.
        key - The key of the property to store.
        value - The value of the property.
        comments - Optional comments to include in the file.

      • getProperties

        public static java.util.Properties getProperties​(java.lang.String filePath)
        Loads properties from the specified properties file.
        参数:
        filePath - The path to the properties file.
        返回:
        A Properties object containing the loaded properties.

      • unzip

        public static void unzip​(java.lang.String zipFilePath,
                         java.lang.String destDirectory)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Unzips the specified zip file to a destination directory.
        参数:
        zipFilePath - The path to the zip file to be unzipped.
        destDirectory - The destination directory where the contents will be extracted.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs during extraction.
